Alec Baldwin was ‘unable to control his.content: “To watch Mr Baldwin’s conduct on the set of Rust is to witness a man who has absolutely no control of his own emotions and absolutely no concern for how his conduct affects those around him,” Morrissey wrote.In a 32-page public filing released on Monday, prosecutor Kari Morrissey alleged that the actor would shout and swear on the set, and his uncontrolled behaviour had affected safety.New Mexico state prosecutors intend to argue that Alec Baldwin was unable to control his emotions on the set of the film Rust.The prosecutor has alleged that Baldwin deflected responsibility after Hutchins was killed and that he had pulled the hammer but not the trigger on the reproduction Colt .The actor, who is also the producer of the film, is due to go on trial in July on a charge of involuntary manslaughter for his part in Hutchins’ death in Santa Fe.

Maidaan Movie Review: Ajay Devgn's film.content: The film opens in 1952, when the Indian football team was brutally defeated by France at the Olympics.Rahim's team itself is not devoid of Bengali footballers.Rahim recruits talent from across the country - much to the dismay of influential sports writer Roy Choudhary (Gajraj Rao) and federation member Shubrata (Rudranil) who want to lobby for a Bengali coach and Bengali players.It had players like Chuni Goswami (Amartya Ray), PK Banerjee (Chaitanya Sharma), and Arun Ghosh - men who became stalwarts in the subsequent years in Indian football.Rahim (Ajay Devgn) has been accused of the team's dismal performance and the football federation of India is keen to replace him.

Hyderabad-origin actress Avantika Vandan.content: Indian-American actress Avantika Vandanapu, who is best known for playing Karen Shetty in the musical comedy Mean Girls (2024), has been honoured with the “South Asian Person of the Year” award and title by Harvard University.This award is not just a recognition of my work, but it shines a light on the importance of storytelling that crosses borders and the vital role of Indian representation in global media.The actress was born to an Indian, Telugu-speaking family who lived in California.She also recently made her OTT debut with the Indian series Big Girls Don’t Cry.Upon receiving the award, Avantika said, "Receiving this honour from an institution as esteemed as Harvard University is incredibly humbling and beyond inspiring.

Jonathan Majors ordered counselling by c.content: In court Monday, Judge Michael Gaffey sentenced Majors to conditional discharge after noting that both sides agreed the charges did not warrant jail time, given the actor was a first-time offender with no prior criminal record.Actor Jonathan Majors has been ordered to complete a year-long counselling programme for assaulting his ex-girlfriend in a high-profile case.Majors was asked to undergo therapy but was not given jail time for the allegations that derailed the once-promising star’s career.According to the court order, Majors must complete a 52-week, in-person batterer’s intervention programme in Los Angeles, where the actor lives.If he violates the terms, Majors will have to face a year in jail.

Vikrant Massey's 12th Fail to release in.content: Recalling the audience response his movie got at the first edition of the Festival of Young Cinema (Asia-Europe) in Macau, the veteran filmmaker said, “We are releasing in China in a big way this year.In an interview with Variety, director Vidhu Vinod Chopra revealed that they are planning to release the movie in a big way in China.After the movie's roaring success in India, Vikrant Massey's film is heading for a release in China.Not only in China but in every market where there is struggle… where, like in the movie, there is a big government job that you can get through exams and then that changes your life.Upon its release on October 27, 2023, the movie based on the real-life story of IAS Manoj Kumar Sharma not only earned critics' praise but went on to earn whopping numbers at the box office.

Dhanush and Aishwarya Rajinikanth file f.content: The couple began legal proceedings for their divorce almost two years after announcing their separation in January 2022.The statement released by the couple said, “18 years of togetherness as friends, couple, as parents and well-wishers to each other...As per Indian Today, sources have confirmed that the former couple filed the petition under Section 13 B - divorce by mutual consent.On January 18, 2022, Venkatesh Prabhu Kasthuri Raja, famously known as Dhanush and Aishwarya announced their separation after 18 years of marriage.After announcing their separation, many reports stated that the couple were looking for reconciliation.

Jonathan Majors faces sentencing for ass.content: “As he eagerly anticipates closing this chapter, he looks forward to redirecting his time and energy fully toward his family and his art,” Majors’ lawyers said in a statement last week after losing their bid to have the conviction tossed out.Actor Jonathan Majors is scheduled to be sentenced Monday in a New York court for assaulting his former girlfriend, a conviction that has already derailed the once-rising star’s career.The conviction stems from an altercation in March 2023 in which Majors’ then-girlfriend Grace Jabbari accused him of attacking her in the backseat of a chauffeured car, saying he hit her head with his open hand, twisted her arm behind her back and squeezed her middle finger until it fractured.Majors claimed the 31-year-old British dancer was the aggressor, flying into a jealous rage after reading a text message from another woman on his phone.Last month, Jabbari filed a civil suit in Manhattan federal court, accusing the actor of assault, battery, defamation and inflicting emotional distress.

Kiran Rao on her divorce with Aamir Khan.content: Talking about her marriage with Aamir, she said, ''Aamir and I lived together for about a year before we got married, and honestly, we did it more because of our parents.There’s so much responsibility on the woman to run the house, to keep the family together… I took my sweet time so I didn’t have any worry about it.Kiran, who got married to Aamir in 2005, said she 'didn't fear' a divorce and wanted to live independently.During her recent interview with Brut, Kiran, who never shies away from putting forward her views, reflected on her marriage with Mr perfectionist, as she went on to discuss how marriage tends to be suffocating for a woman.Filmmaker and director Kiran Rao and actor Aamir Khan got divorced in 2021, ending their 15-year-long marriage.

Interview: Anand Pandit on Veer Savarkar.content: Our key focus was to deliver a compelling cinematic experience while keeping in mind the sensitivities surrounding the historical figure and the incidents depicted in the movie.Also read: Swatantrya Veer Savarkar: Randeep Hooda’s movie witnesses big jump in third week at boxAnand: The key purpose of the movie is to shed light on Savarkarji's life and legacy, ensuring that his message reaches today's and future generations.While I am happy with the excellent reception the movie has received, what is more satisfying for me is that many people, especially the youth, have understood the life of this great leader.Anand: Even before the release, I have mentioned that my primary aim with the movie Swatantra Veer Savarkar is not financial gain.
